__e: But he was not interested... in the true nature of the Soviet Union or any of that crap.
The French government has recognized Soviet Russia... and he doubts that they will risk a war for my poor sake.
It sounds more like someone got their hands on some old Soviet hardware and are using it to perpetrate an attack on the United States.
And I, being personally responsible for Soviet security in the entire Eastern Seaboard of the United States, refuse to turn him over to his operator until at least one practical test has been run.
You know the name you found on your grandmother's Soviet I.D.?
It has to do with the old Soviet system. It has to do with family. And it had to do with what their particular talent was.
